entries.content: Objections are not rejections but opportunities for the prospect to discover their need for your solution.
entries.notes: Emphasizes shifting perspective from defensive to exploratory during objections.

entries.content: Use questions to help prospects discover their own problems and needs, rather than justifying your product.
entries.notes: Focuses on enabling self-realization in the prospect.

entries.content: Your role is to determine if the prospect should be your customer, not to convince them to buy.
entries.notes: Reinforces a position of strength and selectivity.

entries.content: A man convinced against his will is of the same opinion still.
entries.notes: Highlights the futility of convincing over enabling discovery.

entries.content: Credibility comes from the questions you ask, not the answers you give.
entries.notes: Strategic emphasis on inquiry over explanation.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
